title: Where to get the COVID-19 Vaccine
description: Where and how to get the COVID-19 vaccine in northern Michigan. Resources from Munson Healthcare.
cleaned_text: Where to get the COVID-19 Vaccine COVID-19 vaccine eligibility in Michigan is open to ages 6 months and older. Call your primary care physician, local health department (listed below), or local retail pharmacy to determine availability for yourself, your child, or a family member. COVID-19 vaccines are free to anyone living in the United States, regardless of ability to pay, insurance status, or immigration status. COVID-19 Vaccine Locations Near Me Please schedule your COVID-19 vaccine at or through one of the resources listed above. Need more information on where to go for the type of care you need? Learn more in our latest [Munson Minutes video](https://youtu.be/pbE2A6BR1IQ) on where to go for care. Questions about the COVID-19 vaccine? Ask a Nurse! A Munson Healthcare nurse is standing by, ready to answer your vaccine and other health related questions and concerns. Call [231-935-0951](http://tel:231-935-0951) daily from 7 am to 11 pm. There is no charge for this service and no insurance is required.
